languages.text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца в своем дворце — мужчина из семейства Гапрак был убит во время молитвы Императору. При нем была эта записка. Вам что-нибудь известно об этом?"

traits.locale_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца в своем дворце — мужчина из семейства Гапрак был убит во время молитвы Императору. При нем была эта записка. Вам что-нибудь известно об этом?"

languages.text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
languages.original_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца в своем дворце — мужчина из семейства Гапрак был убит во время молитвы Императору. При нем была эта записка. Вам что-нибудь известно об этом?"

traits.locale_text: "I have discovered a dead body in my house — a man of House Gaprak had been killed during his prayer to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body in my house — a man of House Gaprak had been killed during his prayer to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body in my house: a man of House Gaprak was killed during his prayer to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you happen to know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body in my house: a man of House Gaprak was killed during his prayer to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you happen to know anything about it?"
"I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

languages.text: 「私の宮殿で死体を見つけた。ギャプラック家の人間が、皇帝に祈りを捧げている最中に殺されたのだ。こんなメモを持っていた。何か知らないか？」
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: 「私の宮殿で死体を見つけた。ギャプラック家の人間が、皇帝に祈りを捧げている最中に殺されたのだ。こんなメモを持っていた。何か知らないか？」

languages.text: “我在宫殿里发现了一具尸体。贾帕克家族的人在向帝皇祈祷时被杀害了，口袋里还装着这张纸条。说不定你知道这是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: “我在宫殿里发现了一具尸体。贾帕克家族的人在向帝皇祈祷时被杀害了，口袋里还装着这张纸条。说不定你知道这是怎么回事？”

languages.text: « J'ai découvert un cadavre dans l'enceinte de mon palais. Un membre de la maison Gaprak a été tué alors qu'il priait l'Empereur. Nous avons trouvé ce papier sur lui. Savez-vous quoi que ce soit à ce sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai découvert un cadavre dans l'enceinte de mon palais. Un membre de la maison Gaprak a été tué alors qu'il priait l'Empereur. Nous avons trouvé ce papier sur lui. Savez-vous quoi que ce soit à ce sujet ? »

languages.text: «He encontrado el cadáver de un hombre de la casa Gaprak en mi palacio. Lo mataron mientras rezaba al Emperador, pero llevaba esta nota. ¿Sabe algo al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: «He encontrado el cadáver de un hombre de la casa Gaprak en mi casa. Lo mataron mientras le rezaba al Emperador. Tenía esta nota. ¿Sabe algo al respecto?».

languages.text: "Ich habe in meinem Palast eine Leiche entdeckt: Ein Mann von Haus Gaprak wurde während seines Gebets zum Imperator getötet. Er hatte diese Notiz bei sich. Wisst Ihr etwas darüber?"
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe in meinem Haus eine Leiche entdeckt: Ein Mann von Haus Gaprak wurde während seines Gebets zum Imperator getötet. Er hatte diese Notiz bei sich. Wisst Ihr zufällig etwas darüber?"

languages.text: "Sarayımda bir ceset buldum. Gaprak Hanesi'ne mensup bir adam, İmparator'a dua ederken öldürülmüş. Üstünden şu kâğıt çıktı. Bir bilgin var mı?"
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body in my palace: a man of House Gaprak was killed while praying to the Emperor. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Sarayımda bir ceset buldum. Gaprak Hanesi mensubu bir adam, İmparator'a dua ederken öldürülmüş. Üstünden şu kâğıt çıktı. Bir bilgin var mı?"
